name: Geralt of Rivia
description: Geralt was the son of the sorceress Visenna and, presumably, the warrior Korin. Prior to 1230, shortly after his birth, Geralt was taken by his mother to the School of the Wolf at the stronghold of Kaer Morhen.

name: Triss Merigold
description: Triss Merigold of Maribor was a legendary Temerian sorceress of the 13th century. A member of King Foltest's royal council along with Fercart and Keira Metz, as well as a founding member of the Lodge of Sorceresses.

name: Xarthisius
description: Xarthisius was a Nilfgaardian mage of dubious note, more of a fortune-teller and astrologer according to peers.

name: Villentretenmerth
description: Villentretenmerth (Common Speech: Three Black Birds) was one of the only two known Golden dragons in the entire history of the Continent. As he loved living amongst other creatures, and was highly skilled in the art of polymorphism.

name: Yennefer of Vengerberg
description: A sorceress who lived in Vengerberg, the capital city of Aedirn. She was Geralt of Rivia's true love and a mother figure to Ciri, whom she viewed like a daughter to the point that she did everything she could to rescue the girl and keep her from harm.

name: Cirilla Fiona Elen Riannon
description: Ciri was born in 1253, and most likely during the Belleteyn holiday. She was the sole princess of Cintra, the daughter of Pavetta and Emhyr var Emreis as well as Queen Calanthe's granddaughter.

name: Caranthir Ar-Feiniel
description: Caranthir Ar-Feiniel, also once known as the Golden Child, was a navigator of the Wild Hunt, and was one of Eredin Br√©acc Glas' most trusted men.

name: Frightener
description: The first mage to create a frightener was the infamous renegade Dagobert Sulla. Upon beholding the abomination he had created, Sulla is said to have cried: 'What have I done?' He destroyed the monster; his notes, however, survived.

name: Brouver Hoog
description: Brouver Hoog was a dwarven elder and was the real authority in Mahakam, who had been taking part in politics for two centuries.[1] He resided at Mount Carbon and was known for his traditional and conservative view but he exercised his authority justly.

name: Ihuarraquax
description: Ihuarraquax was a young pure white unicorn who wandered the Korath desert with Ciri for a few days.

name: Aelirenn
description: Aelirenn, also known as Elirena or the White Rose of Shaerrawedd, was an elf who led a last, desperate battle against the encroaching humans roughly 200 years ago in the 1000s.

name: Hemdall
description: Hemdall is a hero of myths and sagas of Skellige. According to legend, there is a magical golden rooster known as Kambi whose task it is to awaken Hemdall before the Last Battle between the forces of good and evil known as "Ragh nar Roog".

name: Golyat
description: According to legend, Golyat had once been a knight who violated his vows, for which he was punished by the Lady of the Lake. Transformed into a giant, he fled into the mountains and would only descend into the inhabited lowlands when hunger forced him to it.

name: Francesca Findabair
description: Francesca Findabair was an elf, a sorceress, and was the queen of the elves of Dol Blathanna as decreed by Emperor Emhyr var Emreis. She was considered to be the most beautiful woman in the world by quite a margin. She was also a founding member of the Lodge of Sorceresses after the fall of the Brotherhood of Sorcerers.

name: King Roegner
description: King Roegner of Cintra, once grievously wounded at the bottom of a ravine, hollered for aid. Alas... His call was answered only by the hisses of vipers and the howls of ravenous werewolves...

name: Letho of Gulet
description: Letho of Gulet, also known as the Kingslayer, was a witcher from the School of the Viper.

name: Assire var Anahid
description: Assire var Anahid was a mage in the Nilfgaardian Empire's service who hailed originally from Vicovaro. She was a sister of Eviva, aunt of Mawr and Cinead var Anahid as well as grandaunt of Cahir Mawr Dyffryn aep Ceallach.

name: Emhyr var Emreis
description: Emhyr var Emreis was Emperor of the Nilfgaardian Empire, Lord of Metinna, Ebbing, Gemmera, and Sovereign of Nazair and Vicovaro from 1257 until his death sometime in the late 13th century.

name: Aguara
description: An aguara, also known as vixen, vulpess, and fox demon, is an antherion: that is she's a non-humanoid creature that can take on the form of a human. In an aguara's case, she has the base form of a fox.

name: Vincent Meis
description: Vincent Meis was the head of the City Guard in Vizima and in charge of the Temple Quarter during 1270. Vincent had an extensive network of contacts that included Thaler, Raymond Maarloeve, and Jethro

name: Ithlinne Aegli aep Aevenien
description: Ithlinne Aegli aep Aevenien was a legendary elven healer, astrologist and oracle.

name: Ocvist
description: The Master of Quartz Mountain, the Destroyer, Trajan's Slayer. In his free time, he likes long walks and candlelight dinners.

name: King Foltest
description: Foltest was the king of Temeria, prince of Sodden, sovereign of Pontaria and Mahakam as well as the senior protector of Brugge and Ellander. He was the son of King Medell and Queen Sancia of Sodden, making him a member of the Temerian Dynasty.

name: Dandelion
description: Julian Alfred Pankratz, Viscount de Lettenhove, better known as Dandelion, was a poet, minstrel, bard, and close friend of Geralt of Rivia.

name: Iorveth
description: Iorweth (Iorveth in the English version of the games) was an Aen Seidhe elf and the commander of the last Scoia'tael commando to be broken during the second war with Nilfgaard.
